header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: recent week, coffee shops, education, injury solicitors, TV, weather/climate, paganism, magazines, photography, technology, accents, politics, books, de-cluttering, boats, religion, other people, music, ceilidh, copyright, short-stories, psychology, plans for the week ahead, computers, recycling, telephones,
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements
